ing: 1 teaspoon agave syrup, or more to taste
3/4 cup vanilla-flavored soy milk (such as Soy DreamÂ®), chilled
n: Vegan Matcha Latte with Coconut Cream
des: "Refreshing and healthy, this creamy vegan matcha latte with fluffy, whipped coconut cream will keep you energized for a long day!"
ins:
Whip coconut cream in a chilled bowl with an electric mixer until fluffy and doubled in volume, 30 seconds to 1 minute.
Combine warm water and green tea powder in a cup; whisk until dissolved. Stir in agave syrup. Stir in soy milk. Spoon whipped coconut cream on top.
